name: Steven Glaser
text:
Staff was very nice and I almost feel bad leaving this review, but the pizza was genuinely terrible :(

Pizza was burnt, there was WAY to much pepper, there were large chunks of onion, and very little sausage on my sausage, pepper, and onion pizza.

For $24 for a 12" pizza with 3 toppings I expected great pizza. Instead I received the opposite. It seems like there are many 5 star reviews so I'm sure this was a fluke, but boy were we disappointed.
key: Anthony's Coal Fired Pizza 48 Walkers Brook Dr READING MA 01867-3224 (781) 944-8454

name: Christopher Berlin
text: Love their brick oven pizza. A bit pricey for pizza. Check out all of their other menu selections as well. Good place for a quick drop in before an IMAX movie up the block at Jordans Furniture.
key: Anthony's Coal Fired Pizza 48 Walkers Brook Dr READING MA 01867-3224 (781) 944-8454

name: Jonathan Nicholas
text: I arrive at this excellent restaurant many times because I enjoy the good mood that is part of this place. The staff is extraordianrillyremarkably loving and qualified. The service is certainly rapid. Needless to say, the food they serve is outstanding. I visited often and I was always pleased. The expense is decent. I recommend this restaurant to my friends and family.
key: Anthony's Coal Fired Pizza 48 Walkers Brook Dr READING MA 01867-3224 (781) 944-8454

name: Ash Jain
text: We hosted an intimate party at Anthony’s. So glad we picked this place! Carlos was amazing to work with and made sure the set up was social distancing appropriate. Our waitress was very accommodating and attentive. The guests loved the experience and raved about the food. Highly recommend them and will surely be coming back soon for the long hot finger pepper pizza.

name: Brynn Rowe
text: I wanted to love this place and I'm hoping we just caught them on a bad night but my square margherita pizza was soggy and our pepperoni pizza was missing the char. We waited excessively long for our food, for our appetizer dishes to be cleared and for drinks to be filled. I'm assuming we should have had separate appetizer plates that could've been cleared before our pizzas arrived but we were only given dinner plates. I had to put my pizza in the remaining sauce from the meatball appetizer. While our waitress refilled drinks for half of our party the other half sat with empty glasses through multiple of her visits to the table. She also didn't seem to realize that the stacked appetizer dishes and empty cups could have been removed from the table until we handed them to her. Another waitress stated that we looked ready and sought out our waitress thinking we were ready to leave. In fact we were still waiting for our food but overcrowded by the empty cups and appetizer platters. It was an expensive bill for mediocre food and poor service.
key: Anthony's Coal Fired Pizza 48 Walkers Brook Dr READING MA 01867-3224 (781) 944-8454

text:
Went here for take out the other night want to try to help the local places . Will never go again ordered small wings they were cold also the Margherita pizza was horrible no taste I had to heat in my oven when I arrived home . Salad was wilted worst take out meal I have had since the quarantine . I always give a generous tip. Will not go back again sorry always heard good reviews but this meal was awful
Ended up trashing it.

name: Robert Green
text:
Went here last night on a whim. Was expecting a run of the mill pizza joint. Was blown away when the chef came out, hand delivered the pizza, and explained how the pizza was made, that they had no freezers, and that all of the ingredients (especially the cheese) were fresh. It was really reflected in the quality of the pizza. Service was exceptional (far above what I would expect of a pizza place), staff was some of the most knowledgeable and friendly I've ever encountered, and the pizza was amazing.

Thank you for the great food and great service. Keep it up.
key: Anthony's Coal Fired Pizza 48 Walkers Brook Dr READING MA 01867-3224 (781) 944-8454

text: Had the pizza, large half cheese, half pepperoni,  it is good. Here's the thing, it's literally just like Bertucci's (across the street ).  Same sauce,  same brick oven taste n crisp,  same cheese. Only difference is the crust is a tiny bit thicker than Bertucci's.   We may go back to try other stuff, pricing is the same as Bertucci's. We did take out n the staff wad nice. So I'm happy.
key: Anthony's Coal Fired Pizza 48 Walkers Brook Dr READING MA 01867-3224 (781) 944-8454

name: A. H.
text: Came in at 12:00pm for lunch, ordered by 12:10pm. Appetizer showed up ‘on time’ I guess, but main course didn’t show up by 12:45pm, at which point we decided to leave. The waitress charged us for the entire meal, then we decided to stay rather than wait for a refund. Food came out shortly after that. The manager offered/promised to comp our bill, and I was agnostic, since we did eat the food in the end, and I’d feel like we’d be taking advantage if she did... so I didn’t wait for the receipt to check. I didn’t care for paying or not, but pretty disappointed and irked nevertheless... just left. Food is for 4 stars, service - 1 star. Understaffed is not an excuse - lunch hour is one hour, not two.
key: Anthony's Coal Fired Pizza 48 Walkers Brook Dr READING MA 01867-3224 (781) 944-8454

name: jaraview
text: Anthony's coal fried pizza is right on the fine line between "well done," as they put it, and burnt. Which is exactly why I loved it. The first thing to come to mind as I dug in was that the pizza was like a breath of fresh air. I was surprised even as to how fresh the sauce tasted.  On the other hand though, the atmosphere of the place was simply loud, and I don't personally like a place with sports memorabilia lining the walls.  All in all I would absolutely return, but not on a busy day such as a Friday or Saturday.
key: Anthony's Coal Fired Pizza 48 Walkers Brook Dr READING MA 01867-3224 (781) 944-8454

name: John Lambert
text:
This is really a mixed review. My service was excellent, the food came out quickly and was really hit or miss.  The chicken wings were a bit bland and a bit charred. I could not really tell if they even salt and peppered them. I don't think they were.  The house salad with chick peas was ok.  I ordered the square Sicilian pizza. The small was $18. I guess for it being called Sicilian I expected it to be a thicker crust. It's a thin crust margarita, very tasty, but really not an $18 pizza.  This was way over priced and not really Sicilian.  The steak and cheese pizza was pretty yummy.  The white pizza was bland.  This place does have craft beers and that's plus.  Only 1 desert available.

Would I go out of my way to return there?  I don't think so.  One item that I would try if I returned was their meatballs.  The red sauce was tasty so maybe I could try another visit if I am out that way again.
key: Anthony's Coal Fired Pizza 48 Walkers Brook Dr READING MA 01867-3224 (781) 944-8454

name: Rubens Argento Junior
text:
(Translated by Google) Nice place, very good food, but the service was rushed. The receptionist showed us the beers of the day, and the waitress, out of the 5 we ordered, informed us that two had not, added to Aperol, which was on the menu and also had none. That demerits the house, but, I would definitely go back. You who follow my comments and photos, click on like.

(Original)
Local agradável, comida muito boa, mas o atendimento apressado. O recepcionista nos indicou as cervejas do dia, e a garçonete, das 5 que pedimos, informou que duas não tinham, somado ao Aperol, que constava no cardápio e também não tinha. Isso demérita a casa, mas, Voltaria com certeza. Você que acompanha meus comentários e fotos, clique no curtir.
